Hi Ben, 

Hope you had a good weekend. Confirming we have added the Christmas closure hours to the home page and also linked the blog post to them.

@manuel the anchor link is not working correctly, it's scrolling too far down. Perhaps just remove the anchor link and do a normal link for now. 

Thanks,

@heath please check it again...

from this article https://www.safensound.net.au/business-storage-solutions-and-christmas-planning-tips/ link to https://www.safensound.net.au/#close hope it work.

let me know if ok now.

@manuel yes, looks great. 

Can you please remove the link TO the blog article and link to these trading hours FROM the blog article, where it mentions it. 

You may need to use an anchor link. Cheers

@heath I tried to do this... :) is that ok?.

https://www.safensound.net.au/

Hi Heath, Yes please. Don't forget to link that blog to them as well. Cheers

Best regards,

Ben Williams
Business Development Manager

Ok sure, I think we put them on the home page, please see the attached screenshot, will that work for you?
@heath This one also where we add this... hmm I don't think if this possible to add on the slide as image too?

Hi Heath,

I would like to put up our Xmas and New Year opening times etc. Last year we did this on the home page but I cannot find where. Any suggestions?

We are closed:

Wednesday 25th December 2019 - Christmas Day

Thursday 26th December 2019 - Boxing Day

Wednesday 1st January 2020 - New Year's Day

Once we have these up then we can link to them from the blog article I gave you. Please advise?

Best regards,

Ben Williams
